casebody.data:
GUILFORD COUNTY
v.
SMITH. No. 274P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. James A. Dickens, Assistant Guilford County Attorney, for Guilford County.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st day of June 2005 by Defendant to Amend Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of June 2005."
